channel.title: CVE Feed for Paystack -- Payment Forms for Paystack
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Paystack -- Payment Forms for Paystack

item.title: CVE-2024-32130|2024-08-02T02:06:43.903Z -- paystack -- payment%20forms%20for%20paystack
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Paystack Payment Forms for Paystack allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Payment Forms for Paystack: from n/a through 3.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-32130|2024-04-17T09:59:35.207Z -- paystack -- payment%20forms%20for%20paystack
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Paystack Payment Forms for Paystack allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Payment Forms for Paystack: from n/a through 3.4.1.
